name: TurkishDate
0:
”Alexa, open Turkish Date.”
”Alexa, begin Turkish Date.”
”Alexa, launch Turkish Date.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: turkish date
des: This skill will help you learn Turkish by speaking today's date in Turkish! Simply ask Alexa to open Turkish Date and you will hear the day of the week, day of the month, month, and year in Turkish.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
